Package mcp.mobius.waila.api

Interface IData

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnergyData, FluidData, ItemData, ProgressData
public interface IData
A typed data for syncing complex data from server to client.

Register data types with IRegistrar.addDataType(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation, java.lang.Class<T>, mcp.mobius.waila.api.IData.Serializer<T>)

For simple data, consider using raw NBT data instead, as it is easier to do and enough for most purpose.

See mcp.mobius.waila.api.data for built-in implementations.
